dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependent_to.description:
KeePassXC - Cross-Platform Password Manager, modern, secure, and open-
source.
dependent_to.name: keepassxc

description:
Argon2 is a password-hashing function that summarizes the state of the
art in the design of memory-hard functions and can be used to hash
passwords for credential storage, key derivation, or other applications.
name: argon2

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
